Description:
Name: Orbitron
Created by: Sebastian Stoff
License: Cardware
Format: Exe
Version: 3.71 From: 2005.09.08
Compatible with: Win 9x/Me/2k/XP/2k3

Description:

Orbitron is a tracking system of satellites for radio amateurs and celestial observation. It is also used by professionals in meteorology, users of satellite communications, hobistas in OVNI and astrologers.
   The application shows the position of satellites in a given time (in real or simulated). It is free (Cardware *) and probably one of the most powerful satellite tracking and easy to use, according to the opinion of hundreds of users around the world. Please try it.
Main features:
They can be loaded and screened 20 000 satellites at the same time, and full screen modes of presentation, method of searching for passages of Iridium flares and advanced, Synchronization PC\&#039;s clock by NTP, Updater IELT of the Internet via HTTP (with support for ZIP ), Control of rotor / radios (support for embedded drivers or the user), includes a screensaver.
